From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> > 
Sent: Wednesday, March 13, 2024 3:04 PM
To: Hani Gebara <Hani.Gebara@nascodubai.com <mailto:Hani.Gebara@nascodubai.com> >

Subject: Water Leakage 13/02/2024 - Tryano Yas Mall

 

!

EXTERNAL EMAIL
Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

Dear Hani,

 

Hope all is well.

 

With reference to the property all risk insurance of Allied Enterprises LLC, kindly note that some merchandise are damage due to water leakage from ceiling in the month of February in the stockroom of Tryano. Please find attached incident report as well as details of damage items.

 

Location: YAS MALL - Tryano - Unit nos. LG-028,G-098, G-099, G-100,L1-081, L1-082,L1-083 - All Stores Under Chalhoub Group Management + Al Jaber Optical

 

The boxes are damaged and also the products inside are affected from the water.

 

Please advise the details required in order to proceed.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 8045000

From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> > 
Sent: Wednesday, March 13, 2024 3:04 PM
To: Hani Gebara <Hani.Gebara@nascodubai.com <mailto:Hani.Gebara@nascodubai.com> >
Cc: Yogesh Naresh Patil <Yogesh.Patil@nascodubai.com <mailto:Yogesh.Patil@nascodubai.com> >
Subject: Water Leakage 13/02/2024 - Tryano Yas Mall

 

!

EXTERNAL EMAIL
Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

Dear Hani,

 

Hope all is well.

 

With reference to the property all risk insurance of Allied Enterprises LLC, kindly note that some merchandise are damage due to water leakage from ceiling in the month of February in the stockroom of Tryano. Please find attached incident report as well as details of damage items.

 

Location: YAS MALL - Tryano - Unit nos. LG-028,G-098, G-099, G-100,L1-081, L1-082,L1-083 - All Stores Under Chalhoub Group Management + Al Jaber Optical

 

The boxes are damaged and also the products inside are affected from the water.

 

Please advise the details required in order to proceed.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 8045000

Subject: Water Leakage 13/02/2024 - Tryano Yas Mall

 

!

EXTERNAL EMAIL
Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

Dear Hani,

 

Hope all is well.

 

With reference to the property all risk insurance of Allied Enterprises LLC, kindly note that some merchandise are damage due to water leakage from ceiling in the month of February in the stockroom of Tryano. Please find attached incident report as well as details of damage items.

 

Location: YAS MALL - Tryano - Unit nos. LG-028,G-098, G-099, G-100,L1-081, L1-082,L1-083 - All Stores Under Chalhoub Group Management + Al Jaber Optical

 

The boxes are damaged and also the products inside are affected from the water.

 

Please advise the details required in order to proceed.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

Subject: Water Leakage 13/02/2024 - Tryano Yas Mall

 

!

EXTERNAL EMAIL
Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

Dear Hani,

 

Hope all is well.

 

With reference to the property all risk insurance of Allied Enterprises LLC, kindly note that some merchandise are damage due to water leakage from ceiling in the month of February in the stockroom of Tryano. Please find attached incident report as well as details of damage items.

 

Location: YAS MALL - Tryano - Unit nos. LG-028,G-098, G-099, G-100,L1-081, L1-082,L1-083 - All Stores Under Chalhoub Group Management + Al Jaber Optical

 

The boxes are damaged and also the products inside are affected from the water.

 

Please advise the details required in order to proceed.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

Subject: Water Leakage 13/02/2024 - Tryano Yas Mall

 

!

EXTERNAL EMAIL
Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

Dear Hani,

 

Hope all is well.

 

With reference to the property all risk insurance of Allied Enterprises LLC, kindly note that some merchandise are damage due to water leakage from ceiling in the month of February in the stockroom of Tryano. Please find attached incident report as well as details of damage items.

 

Location: YAS MALL - Tryano - Unit nos. LG-028,G-098, G-099, G-100,L1-081, L1-082,L1-083 - All Stores Under Chalhoub Group Management + Al Jaber Optical

 

The boxes are damaged and also the products inside are affected from the water.

 

Please advise the details required in order to proceed.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

Dear Hani,

 

Hope all is well.

 

With reference to the property all risk insurance of Allied Enterprises LLC, kindly note that some merchandise are damage due to water leakage from ceiling in the month of February in the stockroom of Tryano. Please find attached incident report as well as details of damage items.

 

Location: YAS MALL - Tryano - Unit nos. LG-028,G-098, G-099, G-100,L1-081, L1-082,L1-083 - All Stores Under Chalhoub Group Management + Al Jaber Optical

 

The boxes are damaged and also the products inside are affected from the water.

 

Please advise the details required in order to proceed.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

Subject: Water Leakage 13/02/2024 - Tryano Yas Mall

 

!

EXTERNAL EMAIL
Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

Dear Hani,

 

Hope all is well.

 

With reference to the property all risk insurance of Allied Enterprises LLC, kindly note that some merchandise are damage due to water leakage from ceiling in the month of February in the stockroom of Tryano. Please find attached incident report as well as details of damage items.

 

Location: YAS MALL - Tryano - Unit nos. LG-028,G-098, G-099, G-100,L1-081, L1-082,L1-083 - All Stores Under Chalhoub Group Management + Al Jaber Optical

 

The boxes are damaged and also the products inside are affected from the water.

 

Please advise the details required in order to proceed.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI
